review: Amazing the numbers of choices given. I should have signed on earlier.
author: Theodore

review: Purchased this specifically for the Sling App and it has worked perfectly. It doesn't crash or have booting up issues like the Chromocast does.
author: Derek Wilkes

review: Overall, I like the Fire TV Stick, especially the responsiveness.A wishlist item for me is...I wish it had a Last/Recent button that the apps can leverage for their in-app functions (e.g.) inside a TV service app, if I want to switch back to the channel I was watching recently, I have to bring up the Main Menu to navigate to where I want to go as opposed to just using a dedicated button. Though there is a Back button, that either gets you out of the current app you're in or the current app will show a message like "this function is unavailable".Maybe a double-press of the Back button can be used by the apps to act like a Last/Recent button.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I ditched my cable box. I can watch what I need, movies and TV series, between Amazon Prime and Netflix without having to pay for 150 channels. Streaming is awesome!
author: T. Steven Miller "MrTsmiller"

review: Wonderful device.  Technology came a far way.
author: A Jeff

review: works great just wish vuuduu was on it  and a couple of others I use ..
author: calvin w ninness "Cal"
